testCase.name: Code System Service Unit Test should be defined
Code System Service Unit Test should get code system by type
Code System Service Unit Test should get code system by code system name
Code System Service Unit Test should add new code system
User Service Unit Test should be defined
User Service Unit Test should create a new user
User Service Unit Test should not create a new user if email is invalid
User Service Unit Test should not create a user if password is less than 6 characters
User Service Unit Test should validate a user
User Service Unit Test should fail validation if user email already exists
User Service Unit Test should fail validation if user phone already exists
User Service Unit Test should get one user
User Service Unit Test should login a user with email
User Service Unit Test should login a user with phone
User Service Unit Test should not login with invalid email
User Service Unit Test should not login with invalid phone
User Service Unit Test should not login with invalid password
User Service Unit Test should log a user out
User Service Unit Test should generate JWT token
User Service Unit Test should throw error generating JWT token if id is not provided
User Service Unit Test should decode JWT token
User Service Unit Test should throw error while decoding JWT token
User Service Unit Test should update user password
User Service Unit Test should not update user password if old password is incorrect
User Service Unit Test should not update user password if password validation fails
User Service Unit Test should not update user password if the user does not exist
User Service Unit Test should not reset user password if an email is not provided
User Service Unit Test should not reset user password if a user with the email does not exist
User Service Unit Test should reset user password if an email is provided and a user with the email exist
User Service Unit Test should update user
User Service Unit Test should check for existing user and throw error if the user already exist
User Service Unit Test should check for existing user and not throw error if the user does not exist already
